title: Subpart 1208-2 - Minimum Training Requirements and Minimum Standards
content:
Subpart 1208-2 - Minimum Training Requirements and Minimum Standards

State Regulations
§ 1208-2.1 - Minimum training requirements for building safety inspectors and code enforcement officials
§ 1208-2.2 - Minimum standards for local governments, counties and State agencies

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
